definition: to ally/to unite/to join/(poetry) antithetical couplet

square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter

sentences.english: The post also included contact information with the assistant to the publisher.
sentences.chinese: 文章中還公佈了報刊發行助理的聯繫方式。

sentences.english: If you are interested, I will give you the contact information.
sentences.chinese: 如果你感興趣，我會把他的聯繫方式給你。

sentences.english: The only thing worse is forgetting to include your contact information at all.
sentences.chinese: 當然，更壞的情況是你根本忘了留你的聯繫方式。

sentences.english: Have you included all the necessary information on how to get a hold of you?
sentences.chinese: 你把你所有聯繫方式的必要信息都寫進去了嗎？

sentences.english: In order to avoid your valuable time, please choose other contact information.
sentences.chinese: 爲免擔誤您的寶貴時間，請選擇其它聯繫方式。

sentences.english: Smart cards store credit-card numbers, personal contact information, and so on.
sentences.chinese: 智能卡存儲信用卡號碼，個人聯繫方式等。

sentences.english: It’sone more place to list your contact information.
sentences.chinese: 它提供了另外一個給出你的聯繫方式的地方。

sentences.english: For groups, please tell us the name of your group clearly and how we can contact with you.
sentences.chinese: 組合報名請寫清隊名與組合聯絡人聯繫方式。

sentences.english: Don't wait until the end of a conversation to exchange contact information, he advises.
sentences.chinese: 他建議，不要等到談話結束的時候才交換聯繫方式。

sentences.english: Only the golden members can reach contact information in the international sourcing part.
sentences.chinese: 只有黃金會員才能查看國際採購信息的企業聯繫方式。

sentences.english: HOW can I communicate with you ? emai or qq?
sentences.chinese: 聯繫方式，都沒有怎麼跟你聊天？

sentences.english: Contact details for the people who manage your programme are given in Appendix C.
sentences.chinese: 其它的項目管理人員的聯繫方式請參考附錄C。

sentences.english: The story included the contact information of a hotel owner.
sentences.chinese: 文章中還提到了旅館老闆的聯繫方式。

sentences.english: Again, thoroughly check your contact information in the email.
sentences.chinese: 此外，仔細檢查郵件中你的聯繫方式。

sentences.english: Otherwise change locations or get her contact information and then leave.
sentences.chinese: 否則，就換個地方，或者要到她聯繫方式，然後走人。

sentences.english: You'll be welcome to the press centers. As for their contact numbers, I will ask my colleague to tell you.
sentences.chinese: 關於新聞中心的具體聯繫方式，我會請同事與你聯繫。

definition: to get in touch with/to contact/to stay in contact (with)/liaison/(math.) connection
connection/contact/relation/to get in touch with/to integrate/to link/to touch
email/abbr. for 電子郵件|电子邮件[dian4 zi3 you2 jian4]
variant of 聯繫|联系[lian2 xi4]
to ask/to invite/please (do sth)/to treat (to a meal etc)/to request
to sign up/to enter one's name/to apply/to register/to enroll/to enlist
